comment:
* Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include a large image attachment. * * Here's how you'd set the BigPictureStyle on a notification: * 
     * Notification notif = new Notification.Builder(mContext)
     *     .setContentTitle("New photo from " + sender.toString())
     *     .setContentText(subject)
     *     .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.new_post)
     *     .setLargeIcon(aBitmap)
     *     .setStyle(new Notification.BigPictureStyle()
     *         .bigPicture(aBigBitmap))
     *     .build();
     *
* * @see Notification#bigContentView

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle setBigContentTitle(@Nullable CharSequence title)
methods.comment:
* Overrides ContentTitle in the big form of the template.
         * This defaults to the value passed to setContentTitle().

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle setSummaryText(@Nullable CharSequence cs)
methods.comment: * Set the first line of text after the detail section in the big form of the template.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle setContentDescription(@Nullable CharSequence contentDescription)
methods.comment: * Set the content description of the big picture.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle bigPicture(@Nullable Bitmap b)
methods.comment: * Provide the bitmap to be used as the payload for the BigPicture notification.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle bigPicture(@Nullable Icon icon)
methods.comment: * Provide the content Uri to be used as the payload for the BigPicture notification.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle showBigPictureWhenCollapsed(boolean show)
methods.comment:
* When set, the {@link #bigPicture(Bitmap) big picture} of this style will be promoted and
         * shown in place of the {@link Builder#setLargeIcon(Icon) large icon} in the collapsed
         * state of this notification.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle bigLargeIcon(@Nullable Bitmap b)
methods.comment: * Override the large icon when the big notification is shown.

methods.name: public BigPictureStyle bigLargeIcon(@Nullable Icon icon)
methods.comment: * Override the large icon when the big notification is shown.

methods.name: public static Icon getPictureIcon(@Nullable Bundle extras)

methodNames: public static Icon getPictureIcon(@Nullable Bundle extras)
